title: Biggest rule change ever and Brit teen - what's new in Formula 1 in 2026?
subtitle: BBC Sport runs down the key things to look out for in the 2026 season, including fresh regulations, a new team and a British rookie joining the grid.
full_text: BBC Sport runs down the key things to look out for in the 2026 season, including fresh regulations, a new team and a British rookie joining the grid.
